title: Bug 37021 - Source path is incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path is incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. To reproduce the issue, run the code provided in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. The tests have limitations and may return false positives due to the lack of filename checking in the harness verification of messages. It seems that AJDT omits the filename if it does not make sense to AJDT.
OB: When declaring warning messages and targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath is listed in the form 'app.Main.class'.
EB: The sourcepath in declare warning messages should be listed in the form 'app/Main.class' when targeting .class files from injars.
SR:
1. Download and navigate to the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/..' directory.
2. Run the code provided in that directory.
3. Observe the source path in the declare warning messages.
